lead_paragraph: Mikhail M. Kasyanov, a leading figure in the political opposition was attacked late Tuesday in Moscow by a dozen or so men who placed a cake on his head.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Russia: Putin Opponent Is Attacked After Veiled Threat
headline.main: Russia: Putin Opponent Is Attacked After Veiled Threat

snippet: Mikhail M. Kasyanov, a leading figure in the political opposition was attacked late Tuesday in Moscow by a dozen or so men who placed a cake on his head.
abstract: Russian opposition leader Mikhail M Kasyanov is attacked in Moscow restaurant and smeared with cake by men yelling death threats; attack comes after Chechen leader Ramzan A Kadyrov issued veiled threat against him online.
